steps.description: Verify repository URL and correct it if necessary
Clone project repository using corrected repository URL
Run static code analysis with mypy and pylint on main.py
Utilize a bug finder tool (e.g., Pylint, Pyflakes) to identify top 3 bugs in the project
Analyze and prioritize the identified bugs based on severity and impact
Refactor main.py using a code editor or IDE (e.g., PyCharm, Visual Studio Code)
